features: 【4K Digital Camera with Flip Screen】The digital camera with 4K video and 48MP photo resolution for photography and video. Cameras for photography has a 3-inch screen and can rotate 180 degrees, allowing you to see what's being recorded or view it while taking a vlog from any angle.

【16X Great Cameras for Photography】The vlogging camera supports 16X digital zoom, video pause, recording while charging, loop recording, continuous shooting, beauty function and selfie. Adopting the latest upgraded chip to ensure higher definition and more realistic camera images. Especially the beauty feature, it can help you catch the attention of others and win more likes on social media platforms at once.This is the best gift for friends and family.

【Compact Camera with Two Batteries】 - This video recording camera is only the size of a palm and is a perfect omnidirectional camera that won't take up too much space in your bag.Equipped with two rechargeable batteries, super long standby time of 2 hours, whether it's recording a concert or shooting a Vlog while traveling, there's no problem,you don't have to hold them all the way or worry about running out of batteries.

【Auto focus 48MP flash photography】 - Every happy moment is a blockbuster! Its built-in flash will emit a powerful and less dazzling light, while presenting exquisite photos, making it perfect for selfies in low light or dark conditions.

【Ideal Gift Choice】 Package includes a 4K camera, two batteries, 32GB memory card, USB cable, adapter, lanyard. It's a perfect gift for lovers, friends, children, or parents on Christmas,Thanksgiving, birthdays and all important events. And with our comprehensive after-sales protection, you can always feel confident that you're making a smart purchase. If you have any questions, just let us know!

productInformation.value: #19,581 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #103 in Digital Point & Shoot Cameras

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up, great buy.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Compact Small Camera with Two Batteries, and it has exceeded my expectations! The 16X zoom capability allows me to capture stunning details, and the higher definition and realistic images make every shot come to life. Easy to set up, and the dual batteries ensure that I never miss a moment. Whether I'm into photography or video, this digital point and shoot camera is my go-to choice. It's a great buy, and even my son, who's a budding photographer, loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars feels cheap but takes better photos than my $400 camera. Not sure about vid quality yet.
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Battery doesn't seem to hold for too long, good it comes with 2 batteries and a charger!So far one thing I don't like about it is that I have to go through the menu to delete pics. Also hard to get from the photo just taken, checking it, and going back to take another picture. The date doesn't stay either. If you want a date you have to change it all the time. The selfie aspect of it works well but it's hard to find/hold the snap button. Kind of awkward. At least my fingers don't cover the lens as it does on my much more expensive camera. It does have a tripod attachment port on the bottom. There are a few quirks to this little camera, but I think as I get used to it it'll be ok. Good little starter camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty in Pink
reviews.reviewText: This pink G-Anica Digital Camera is as functional as it is stylish. Boasting a 48 MP resolution, it captures high-quality images that are sure to impress. The camera's ease of use makes it a great entry point for new photographers, while the wide-angle lens invites experimentation with different types of shots. Its ability to function as a webcam adds versatility, particularly for those who frequently switch between photography and video calls. The smaller sensor size does mean it might not perform as well in low light, but for most situations, it offers great value. It's a camera that won't intimidate beginners and has enough features to explore as you grow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No good camera
reviews.reviewText: Speaker is lousy, nothing but static when playing back. SettingS have to be made everytime camera is turned on. If possible invest in good camera, the one I bought is terrible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars really bad audio
reviews.reviewText: you get what you pay for. the audio is absolutely horrible and the camera quality is okay. definitely not the greatest but good to take pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute color, great picture quality, and good battery life
reviews.reviewText: This camera stands out with a unique color, precisely the one I've always wanted to highlight my personality. It has a moderate weight, providing a sense of quality when held, yet it is not heavy. With a strap design, it's very convenient for me to carry when going out, either in hand or around my neck. The camera is made of good material; I easily get sweaty hands, but there's no sign of slipping when holding it. The battery life is sufficient, and the camera is quite power-efficient, allowing me to use it throughout an entire day. It possesses both photography and video recording functions, producing very clear results. It's an excellent choice for beginners in photography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact but takes great photos
reviews.reviewText: We got this to use when traveling because my brother recently had someone try and steal his phone while taking pictures on trip. I looked around and liked this one because it is very compact, so does not take up extra room in my bag. The high MP and zoom were important to me so I could get clear detailed pictures for printing, if necessary. I have tried out most of the features and am very pleased with my choice. The menu is easy to navigate and configure everything, and the buttons are responsive. The screen is clear and make it easy to review photos so you can only keep those you want without filling up the SD card with junk pics. I tried out the video option and it looks smooth and clear, but probably won't be using that much myself, I mainly want photos. I am really looking forward to our trip this year and will certainly get lots of use from this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cámara para regalo de mi hija, cumplió con las expectativas y se muestra de buena calidad

reviews.reviewTitle: No funciona para fotos en movimiento. Salen como en el celular, todas borrosas
reviews.reviewText: La compré con la intención de tomar fotos de mi hija bailando y no me sirvió. Sale igual que en mi celular. Devuelta
